data.name: Escape
data.detailed_description:
Hello everyone.
In this game, you need to find the key items you need based on clues. Of course, there will be some things that will hinder you. Don't worry, taking pictures of it will make it afraid to approach you.Please use photos to get information about some items, this is very important, please take photos as much as you want, there are many films.But don’t forget, your purpose is to escape from this place.Good luck!
data.about_the_game:
Hello everyone.
In this game, you need to find the key items you need based on clues. Of course, there will be some things that will hinder you. Don't worry, taking pictures of it will make it afraid to approach you.Please use photos to get information about some items, this is very important, please take photos as much as you want, there are many films.But don’t forget, your purpose is to escape from this place.Good luck!
data.short_description: Welcome to CHEYNE escape game series, this is the first work, of course, this is only the first chapter, the follow-up will soon update the second and third chapters, Please look forward to it.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
